web_paas_change_offer_description: You can change solutions, depending on which one you have already subscribed to.
web_paas_change_offer_downgrade_licence_: The solution you have selected offers fewer user licences than your previous product.
You now have {{licencesIncluded}} included user licences, and {{additionalLicences}} additional user licences.
You will need to delete {{usersToRemove}} user licences if you want to downgrade your solution to a lower-level range.
web_paas_change_offer_success: Your solution and options have been modified.
web_paas_change_offer_error: An error has occurred modifying the solution: {{message}}
